description: Whole Server selected by Server Serial Number

targets.query: SELECT last("processorModel") FROM "config" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("processorModel") FROM "config" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("pcpu_online") FROM "config" WHERE "serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("entitled_proc_capacity")  FROM "config" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/) AND $timeFilter  group by time(5s)
SELECT sum("entitled_proc_capacity") * 100 / last("pcpu_max") FROM "config" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/) AND $timeFilter group by time(5s)
SELECT sum("physical_busy") FROM "cpu_util" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX' ) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY  time(5s)
SELECT "physical_consumed" FROM "cpu_util" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX' ) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY host
SELECT "run_queue" FROM "kernel" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "user"+"sys"+"wait" FROM "cpu_physical_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.description: 计算内存百分比(%)， 计算内存使用量 / 总物理内存

targets.query: SELECT  ("real_total" - "real_free" - "numperm")  * 100 / "real_total"   FROM "memory" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: 计算内存百分比(%)

targets.query: SELECT  ("real_total" - "real_free" )  * 4096 / 1024 / 1024  FROM "memory" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT  ("real_total" - "real_free" - "numperm")  * 4096 / 1024 / 1024  FROM "memory" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT  ("mb_used" * 100 / "mb_size")  FROM "paging_spaces" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT   "busy" FROM "disks" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "disk_name"
SELECT ("ierrors" + "oerrors") * 100 /  ("ipackets"  + "opackets")   FROM "network_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT   "xfers" FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "ibytes" FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "network_interface_name"
SELECT "obytes" * -1  FROM "network_interfaces"  WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "network_interface_name"
SELECT   "write_blks" * 512 / 1024 / 1024 FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT   "read_blks" * 512 / 1024 / 1024 FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "ipackets"  FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","network_interface_name"
SELECT "opackets" * -1 FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","network_interface_name"
SELECT   "wserv" / 1000000000  FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT   "rserv" / 1000000000  FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.description: 各类进程占用CPU时间比例(%)

targets.query: SELECT  "ucpu_time" + "scpu_time" FROM "processes" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "processe_name"

panels.title: 各类进程占用CPU时间比例(%)

targets.query: SELECT   "wq_time" / 1000000000  FROM "disk_total" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT  "real_inuse" FROM "processes" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "processe_name"
SELECT "used_percent" FROM "filesystems" WHERE ("serial_no" =~ /^$SerialNo$/ AND "os" = 'AIX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","filesystem_name"

title: nimon按序列号整机监控_for_AIX_&_VIOS
